articles.author: Skye Seipp
articles.title: Charges dropped against all 57 arrested in connection to UT-Austin pro-Palestinian protest - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: The Travis County attorney's office, which handles misdemeanor cases, said the arrests lacked probable cause.
articles.content:
All charges have been declined against the 57 people arrested in connection to the Wednesday pro-Palestinian protest at the University of Texas.
The Travis County attorney's office said all 57 arres… [+1941 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Burkina Faso suspends BBC, Voice of America for reporting on army killings - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: In a new report, Human Rights Watch said military forces ‘summarily executed’ 223 civilians in February.
articles.content: Burkina Faso has suspended the BBC and Voice of America (VOA) radio networks from broadcasting for two weeks over their coverage of a report accusing the army of the extrajudicial killings of civilia… [+2714 chars]
